analysis.description:
TokenDistributor (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#176-381) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#326-331)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol:
	Contract TokenDistributor has payable functions:
	 - addLockUpData (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#253-275)
	 - distributeBounty (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#338-349)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in TokenDistributor.addLockUpData (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#253-275):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(neededAmountTotal.add(tokenReserve) <= token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#267-271)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributeList (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#273)
	- neededAmountTotal (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#273-275)
_releasableToken in TokenDistributor.viewNextRelease (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#368) is a local variable never initialiazed
releasableToken in TokenDistributor._releaseToken (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#311-312) is a local variable never initialiazed
_releaseDate in TokenDistributor.viewNextRelease (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#368-369) is a local variable never initialiazed
releasableToken in TokenDistributor.viewLockUpStatus (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#358) is a local variable never initialiazed

TokenDistributor._releaseToken (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#306-325) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_tokenReceiver,releasableToken) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#322-325)

TokenDistributor.transfer (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#326-331) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#331)

TokenDistributor.distributeBounty (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#338-349) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(approver,_receiver[i],_amount[i]) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#345-348)

TokenDistributor.distributeBounty has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transferFrom(approver,_receiver[i],_amount[i]) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd3b58ac11f612609ac84ff9545c9545da1480bda.sol#345-348)
